title: German and Slovak FMs comment after trade talks
description:
(4 Aug 2017) Slovakian Foreign Minister Miroslav Lajcak met his German counterpart, Sigmar Gabriel, in the German city of Wolfsburg on Friday. 
The two ministers signed an agreement on closer trade ties between their countries. 
Gabriel criticised recent US sanctions against Russia, saying they will disrupt Western unity in dealing with Moscow.
